title: Carmelo Anthony
description:
Carmelo Anthony joins The Woj Pod to discuss his revitalization in Portland, inside the 10th anniversary of the Denver-New York trade, how 2010 free agency could've been different for 'Melo and LeBron James, the ill-fated 2004 Athens Olympics and much, much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
